name: Night Terrors (Rocket Boys)
description:
You play as a child that has just woken up into a nightmare! Pick up blocks and match the colors to make it to your bed and escape, if you can. But beware the nightmare never ends...

Classic match 3 mechanics but with a spiraling twist!

____________________________________

1 to 2 players

____________________________________
